title: Leagueclient.exe - Bad Image Error
body: After opening the League of Legends shortcut from my desktop/task bar, an error appears titled "Leagueclient.exe - Bad Image". The error pops up with "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\api - ms - crt - stdio - l1 -1 -0.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error" or something along those lines. I really need a fix please! I have tried many things, such as running it as admin, as well as allowing it to bypass firewall. I'm currently trying Hextech Repair for a clean reinstall but am posting this for a backup. Thank you

replies.body:
Hey there,

How'd the clean reinstall go?

i think i had to reinstall league manually
but it ended up working, thanksssss{{champion:32}}
The exact same thing has been happening to me for the past two days now
I'm having this exact same issue and have tried many things to locate a solution and fix the problem, but to no avail. Any updates or advice would be appreciated, thank you <3{{champion:62}}
